oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tight small Seifert fibered manifolds with $e_0=-2$
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tosun, Bulent
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Geometric Topology
Mathematics - Symplectic Geometry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we provide the classification of tight contact structures on some small Seifert fibered manifolds. As an application of this classification, combined with work of Lekili in \cite{L2010}, we obtain infinitely many counterexamples to a question of Honda-Kazez-Mati\'{c} that asks whether a right-veering, non-destabilizable open book necessarily supports a tight contact structure.
Comment: Corrected main result, and typos. A new section is added
